page.title: 03ROYAL HOLLOWAY COLLEGE
page.content: Royal Holloway College was started in 1877.It was finished being built in 1881.The college opened in 1886.The college was first a girl's college.The walls round the college had glass put on them to stop boys getting in at the girls.Royal Holloway College joined with Bedford College,University of London.In the grounds there are two cottages and one is a Tudor house and the cottage is made out of red bricks with white stones with facings in French Renaissance style. In the College there is a chapel and there's a big stone canopy on the roof.Just opposite there's a picture gallery with over 2000 pictures.The College covers over 400 acres and in the wood there's an old swimming pool that is falling in.A new entrance has been built for traffic to cope with the increased number of students.
